edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.postagger
Interface PartOfSpeechRetagger

All Superinterfaces:
PartOfSpeechTagger
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPartOfSpeechRetagger, HeppleTagger, IRetagger, NoopRetagger, ProperNounRetagger, SimpleRuleBasedTagger
public interface PartOfSpeechRetagger
extends PartOfSpeechTagger

Interface for a Part of Speech retagger.

A retagger takes the output of another tagger and retags the words. Normally this is used to apply fixup rules to the output of a statistical tagger.
